name: wifidrop
description: Instant WIFI Drop P2P Large File Transfer

scripts.gh-deploy-init: git push origin && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy: git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh: npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m "dist" && npm run gh-deploy && git reset --soft HEAD~ && git restore --staged .

author: Nuzulul Zulkarnain
